thread.title: 121 students affected by Bristol fire
thread.title_full: 121 students affected by Bristol fire | West Country (E) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: 121 students affected by Bristol fire
text:
121 students are thought to have been affected by a huge fire which broke out in a halls of residence in the centre of Bristol.
No one is thought to be hurt but alternative accommodation will be needed while damage is repaired.
The University says they are working to rehouse all those affected, and will provide bedding, toiletries and food.
Students will be rehoused between the University and the Council Credit: ITV News Last updated Tue 13 Oct 2015 Read more 8 updates Huge blaze in Bristol centre Travel Bristol
